web.domains.domain_already_in_organizati.en: This domain is already registered in your organization
web.domains.domain_already_in_organizati.translation: Ta domena je že registrirana v vaši organizaciji

web.domains.domain_in_other_organization.en: This domain is already registered to another organization. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
web.domains.domain_in_other_organization.translation: Ta domena je že registrirana drugi organizaciji. Kontaktirajte podporo, če menite, da je to napaka.

web.domains.domain_claimed_successfully.en: Domain successfully claimed and added to your organization
web.domains.domain_claimed_successfully.translation: Domena uspešno zahtevana in dodana vaši organizaciji

web.domains.privacy_defaults_description.en: Set default privacy options for secrets created under this domain. These settings will be pre-filled when creating new secrets.
web.domains.privacy_defaults_description.translation: Nastavite privzete možnosti zasebnosti za skrivnosti, ustvarjene pod to domeno. Te nastavitve bodo vnaprej izpolnjene pri ustvarjanju novih skrivnosti.

web.domains.default_ttl_hint.en: How long secrets should remain accessible by default
web.domains.default_ttl_hint.translation: Kako dolgo naj bodo skrivnosti privzeto dostopne

web.domains.passphrase_required_hint.en: Make passphrase mandatory for all secrets in this domain
web.domains.passphrase_required_hint.translation: Naredi geslo obvezno za vse skrivnosti v tej domeni

web.domains.notify_enabled_hint.en: Enable email notifications by default when secrets are viewed
web.domains.notify_enabled_hint.translation: Privzeto omogoči e-poštna obvestila, ko si nekdo ogleda skrivnosti

web.domains.switcher_locked.en: Domain switching not available on this page
web.domains.switcher_locked.translation: Domain switching not available on this page

web.domains.canonical_no_settings.en: Default domain has no settings page
web.domains.canonical_no_settings.translation: Default domain has no settings page

web.domains.control_whether_users_can_cr.en: Control whether users can create secret links from your domain's homepage
web.domains.control_whether_users_can_cr.translation: Nadzorujte, ali lahko uporabniki ustvarjajo skrivne povezave z domače strani vaše domene

web.domains.manage_and_configure_your_ve.en: Manage and configure your verified custom domains
web.domains.manage_and_configure_your_ve.translation: Upravljajte in konfigurirajte svoje preverjene domene po meri

web.domains.get_started_by_adding_a_cust.en: Get started by adding a custom domain.
web.domains.get_started_by_adding_a_cust.translation: Začnite z dodajanjem domene po meri.

web.domains.in_order_to_connect_your_dom.en: In order to connect your domain, you'll need to have a CNAME record in your DNS that points
web.domains.in_order_to_connect_your_dom.translation: Za povezavo svoje domene boste morali imeti zapis CNAME v svojem DNS, ki kaže

web.domains.if_you_already_have_a_cname_.en: If you already have a CNAME record for that address, please change it to point at
web.domains.if_you_already_have_a_cname_.translation: Če že imate zapis CNAME za ta naslov, ga spremenite, da kaže na

web.domains.a_cname_record_is_not_allowe.en: ), a CNAME record is not allowed. Instead, you'll need to create an A record. Details on how to do this are provided further down the page.
web.domains.a_cname_record_is_not_allowe.translation: ), zapis CNAME ni dovoljen. Namesto tega boste morali ustvariti zapis A. Podrobnosti o tem, kako to narediti, so podane naprej na strani.

web.domains.and_remove_any_other_a_aaaa_.en: and remove any other A, AAAA, or CNAME records for that exact address.
web.domains.and_remove_any_other_a_aaaa_.translation: in odstranite vse druge zapise A, AAAA ali CNAME za ta točen naslov.

web.domains.it_may_take_a_few_minutes_fo.en: It may take a few minutes for your SSL certificate to take effect.
web.domains.it_may_take_a_few_minutes_fo.translation: Lahko traja nekaj minut, da vaš SSL certifikat začne veljati.

web.domains.dns_changes_can_take_as_litt.en: DNS changes can take as little as 60 seconds -- or up to 24 hours -- to take effect.
web.domains.dns_changes_can_take_as_litt.translation: Spremembe DNS lahko trajajo le 60 sekund -- ali do 24 ur -- da začnejo veljati.

web.domains.add_this_hostname_to_your_dn.en: Add this hostname to your DNS configuration:
web.domains.add_this_hostname_to_your_dn.translation: Dodajte to ime gostitelja v svojo konfiguracijo DNS:

web.domains.follow_these_steps_to_verify.en: Follow these steps to verify domain ownership and elevate your online presence:
web.domains.follow_these_steps_to_verify.translation: Sledite tem korakom za preverjanje lastništva domene in dvignite svojo spletno prisotnost:

web.domains.are_you_sure_you_want_to_rem.en: Are you sure you want to remove this domain? This action cannot be undone.
web.domains.are_you_sure_you_want_to_rem.translation: Ali ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti to domeno? Tega dejanja ni mogoče razveljaviti.
